    • 方法详细资料

      • getNewAccount

        public static java.lang.String getNewAccount(java.lang.String account_name,
                             java.lang.String account_pass)
        生成一个新账户
        参数:
        account_name - 账户名
        account_pass - 账户密码
        返回:
        String json字符串 Example http POST data '{"method":"listaddresses","params":["account_name","account_pass"]}' 控制台 ./mvs-cli getnewaccount account_name account_pass 返回 { "mnemonic": "april claim pony betray drink decline silly skull risk cd stomach arm doctor call unusual", "default-address": "MEAYZ4ffQY28BHTfUwWgzGpcEpMzho1wCG" }

      • updatePass

        public static java.lang.String updatePass(java.lang.String account_name,
                          java.lang.String account_pass,
                          java.lang.String account_newpass)
        修改密码
        参数:
        account_name - 账户名
        account_pass - 账户密码
        account_newpass - 新密码 Example http POST data '{"method":"listaddresses","params":["account_name","account_pass","-p", "account_newpass"]}' 控制台 ./mvs-cli changepasswd account_name account_pass -p account_newpass 返回 成功修改无返回

      • getNewAddress

        public static java.lang.String getNewAddress(java.lang.String account_name,
                             java.lang.String account_pass)
        为该账户生成一个地址
        参数:
        account_name - 账户名
        account_pass - 账户密码
        返回:
        String 字符串 Example http POST data '{"method":"getnewaddress","params":["account_name", "account_pass"]}' 控制台 ./mvs-cli getnewaddress account_name account_pass 返回 MKVzbLKrk3E9R2MnCEqZPKKCHWFNK8WeB8

        public static java.lang.String getListAddress(java.lang.String account_name,
                              java.lang.String account_pass)
        获取该账户上的所有地址
        参数:
        account_name - 账户名
        account_pass - 账户密码
        返回:

      • getBalance

        public static java.lang.String getBalance(java.lang.String account_name,
                          java.lang.String account_pass)
        获取该账户上的熵的余额
        参数:
        account_name - 账户名
        account_pass - 账户密码
        返回:
        String json 字符串 Example http POST data '{"method":"getbalance","params":["account_name", "account_pass"]}' 控制台 ./mvs-cli getbalance account_name account_pass 返回 { "total-confirmed": "270000", "total-received": "201120000", "total-unspent": "270000", "total-available": "270000", "total-frozen": "0" }

      • getAsset

        public static java.lang.String getAsset(java.lang.String account_name,
                        java.lang.String account_pass)
        查看该账户上的所有资产
        参数:
        account_name - 账户名
        account_pass - 账户密码
        返回:
        String json 字符串 Example http POST data '{"method":"getaccountasset","params":["account_name", "account_pass"]}' 控制台 ./mvs-cli getaccountasset account_name account_pass 返回 { "assets": [ { "symbol": "CMC", "quantity": "578041516", "decimal_number": "4", "status": "unspent" }, { "symbol": "HRC", "quantity": "702140000", "decimal_number": "8", "status": "unspent" }, { "symbol": "TEA", "quantity": "996", "decimal_number": "4", "status": "unspent" }, { "symbol": "AFT", "quantity": "876060000", "decimal_number": "8", "status": "unspent" }, { "symbol": "MVS.ZGC", "quantity": "1000000", "decimal_number": "8", "status": "unspent" }, { "symbol": "TEC", "quantity": "5", "decimal_number": "0", "status": "unspent" } ] }

      • getAddressAsset

        public static java.lang.String getAddressAsset(java.lang.String address)
        查看该地址上的所有资产
        参数:
        address - 地址
        返回:
        String json字符串 Example http POST data '{"method":"getaddressasset","params":["MS2br43Q4YvtNLin3dzRaUah4JVCmQMc76"]}' 控制台 ./mvs-cli getaddressasset MS2br43Q4YvtNLin3dzRaUah4JVCmQMc76 返回 { "assets": [ { "symbol": "CMC", "quantity": "541932537", "decimal_number": "4", "address": "MS2br43Q4YvtNLin3dzRaUah4JVCmQMc76", "status": "unspent" } ] }

      • fetchBalance

        public static java.lang.String fetchBalance(java.lang.String address)
        查看该地址上的熵的余额
        参数:
        address - 地址
        返回:
        String json字符串 Example http POST data '{"method":"xfetchbalance","params":["MS2br43Q4YvtNLin3dzRaUah4JVCmQMc76"]}' 控制台 ./mvs-cli xfetchbalance MS2br43Q4YvtNLin3dzRaUah4JVCmQMc76 返回 { "balance": { "address": "MS2br43Q4YvtNLin3dzRaUah4JVCmQMc76", "confirmed": "180000", "received": "180000", "unspent": "180000", "frozen": "0" } }

        public static java.lang.String sendForm(java.lang.String account_name,
                        java.lang.String account_pass,

        从该账户指定地址发送ETP到指定地址

        public static java.lang.String sendForm(java.lang.String account_name,
                        java.lang.String account_pass,
                        java.lang.String accept_address,
                        java.lang.String num)

      • listTxs

        public static java.lang.String listTxs(java.lang.String account_name,
                       java.lang.String account_pass)
        查询该账户上的所有交易信息
        参数:
        account_name - 账户名
        account_pass - 账户密码
        返回:
        String json 字符串 Example http POST data '{"method":"listtxs","params":["account_name", "account_pass"]}' 控制台 ./mvs-cli listtxs account_name account_pass 返回 { "transactions": [ { "hash": "ae0de27314b3f400b379dcafc4bbfb35682b6c602bbce231bde6e320ea30fc2b", "height": "322648", "timestamp": "1497681456", "direction": "send", "inputs": [ { "address": "MDFKf9z6vAjKmADeaJGQgF9GtDZDT2qkUJ" } ], "outputs": [ { "own": "true", "address": "MFVjiod8n4jJ6sf1QXzM3GBgxJfUDMFnEt", "etp-value": "10000", "attachment": { "type": "etp" } }, { "own": "true", "address": "MDFKf9z6vAjKmADeaJGQgF9GtDZDT2qkUJ", "etp-value": "30000", "attachment": { "type": "etp" } } ] }, { "hash": "6858ce689b1d4a61ab185d6e9ff9320b9301662175b5c42b55e296c73bc81605", "height": "322638", "timestamp": "1497681128", "direction": "send", "inputs": [ { "address": "MFVjiod8n4jJ6sf1QXzM3GBgxJfUDMFnEt" } ], "outputs": [ { "own": "true", "address": "MDFKf9z6vAjKmADeaJGQgF9GtDZDT2qkUJ", "etp-value": "50000", "attachment": { "type": "etp" } }, { "own": "true", "address": "MFVjiod8n4jJ6sf1QXzM3GBgxJfUDMFnEt", "etp-value": "30000", "attachment": { "type": "etp" } } ] }, ] }

      • fetchHistory

        public static java.lang.String fetchHistory(java.lang.String address)
        查看网络任何地址的交易hash和块高
        参数:
        address - 地址
        返回:
        String json字符串 Example http POST data '{"method":"fetch-history","params":["MWhab6yY81rzu9jpfiwc3GNvbDCigzCyuj"]}' 控制台 ./mvs-cli fetch-history MWhab6yY81rzu9jpfiwc3GNvbDCigzCyuj 返回// { "transfers": [ { "received": { "hash": "a9d1a2e231391933ef3029db9a1ad1b8734fb6b7feb70ee6e17f247536d8c94b", "height": "321963", "index": "0" }, "value": "90000" } ] }

      • validateAddress

        public static java.lang.String validateAddress(java.lang.String address)
        检测地址是否存在
        参数:
        address - 地址
        返回:
        String json字符串 Example http POST data '{"method":"validateaddress","params":["MWhab6yY81rzu9jpfiwc3GNvbDCigzCyuj"]}' 控制台 ./mvs-cli validateaddress MWhab6yY81rzu9jpfiwc3GNvbDCigzCyuj 返回： valid address MWhab6yY81rzu9jpfiwc3GNvbDCigzCyuj {"error":"invalid address!"}

      • importAcount

        public static java.lang.String importAcount(java.lang.String account_name,
                            java.lang.String account_pass,
                            java.lang.String address_number,
                            java.lang.String mnemonic)
        导入账户
        参数:
        account_name - 账户名
        account_pass - 账户密码
        address_number - 导入账户的地址数量
        mnemonic - 助记词
        返回:
        String json字符串 Example http POST data '{"method":"importaccount","params":["--accoutname","account_name","--password", "account_pass","-i5","upon cend soap myth differ wealth ock chef seek cradle reveal garlic nurse keep skin trick hover six"]}' 控制台 ./mvs-cli importaccount --accoutname account_name --password account_pass -i5 upon cend soap myth differ wealth ock chef seek cradle reveal garlic nurse keep skin trick hover six 返回： { "name": "aaa123456", "mnemonic": "upon cend soap myth differ wealth ock chef seek cradle reveal garlic nurse keep skin trick hover six", "hd_index": "10", "addresses": [ "MUsJUUQ4VtKXsxaurNTzwPgioRcsLoHCdG", "MNqmkDkwL9JawN4WpizFKpzEmJayBd539x", "MWGBkJ1CnrBhStU5yPqycCxXXb88rGLBSC", "MS7ZqRrD3nWoWucPToC7YtDJPxKBM9Z6wt", "MCBeEbidRk5CYpazd8ymVLi7PmxryZCi3r" ] }

      • findMnemonic

        public static java.lang.String findMnemonic(java.lang.String account_name,
                            java.lang.String account_pass,
                            java.lang.String word)
        查看账户信息
        参数:
        account_name - 账户名
        account_pass - 账户密码
        word - 该账户助记词的最后一个单词
        返回:
        String json字符串 Example http POST data '{"method":"getaccount","params":["account_name","account_pass"]}' 控制台 ./mvs-cli getaccount account_name account_pass 返回： { "name": "admin", "mnemonic-key": "blossom blush door arrest squirrel off market finish party egg horn over give uncle credit human", "address-count": "3", "user-status": "2" }
